entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 18 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow this morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 18 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
